abstract.p: S & H Greenpoints Communications director David C Berliner letter on Susan Sheehan's August 6 article notes frequent-flier miles can be accumulated with S & H Greenpoints online (S)

block.p: To the Editor: Susan Sheehan's article ''A Taste for Frequent-Flier Miles'' (Aug. 6) was wonderfully insightful. While the headline on the article noted, ''Unlike green-stamp collecting, there's no glue to lick in earning free air trips,'' these days that's only partially true. You can accumulate frequent-flier miles with S & H greenpoints -- the digital reinvention of S & H Green Stamps -- by going to www.greenpoints.com.
DAVID C. BERLINER Director of Communications S & H greenpoints New York, N.Y.
